column2: "Next is my order. Can you find Makino? He should have been here with us."

"He should be in the Shop Area, but...
I can't find him. It seems he is lost."

"He is a Newman boy wearing a yellow costume...
You might think him a girl at first."

"I have searched everywhere...
Well, actually, I have not searched the red and blue rooms, but...
No, he couldn't be."
